amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to expand EPA's Safer Choice Program to include carpets, rugs, clothing, and upholstered furniture that do not contain PFAS.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to expand EPA's Safer Choice Program to include carpets, rugs, clothing, and upholstered furniture that do not contain PFAS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pingree amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Pingree.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pingree amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
